alert.note: Alert for Meeker; Sherburne; Stearns; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 8:13AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Wright, northeastern Meeker, northwestern Sherburne and southeastern Stearns Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 813 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cokato, or 16 miles west of Buffalo, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Annandale around 820 AM CDT. Maple Lake around 825 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Clearwater, Becker, Clear Lake and St. Cloud. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 167 and 189. U.S. Highway 10 in Minnesota between mile markers 182 and 199. U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 111 and 120. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
